TEXT.TITLE: GM <GM> UNIT GETS BOEING <BA> CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: General Motors Corp's Hughes Aircraft Co said it received a contract worth more than 20 mln dlrs from Boeing Co's Boeing Commercial Airplane Co. Hughes will supply a cabin entertainment and service system for Boeing's new 747-4000 jumbo jetliners. Reuter
